climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Wirelessly connect up to 2 smartphones or tablets to the speaker and take turns enjoying powerful sound
Built-in rechargeable li-ion 7800mAh battery supports up to 20 hours of playtime and charges your device via USB port
Take charge 4 to the beach or the pool without worrying about spills or even submersion in water
Amplify your listening experience to epic levels and rock the party perfectly by wirelessly connecting more than 100 JBL connect+ enabled speakers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this and works great. Small compact, but still good sound. We bought another one. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best value bluetooth speaker for under $100
reviews.reviewText: An amazing speaker for less the $100.This is a great speaker for the price. I've owned every main stream wireless bluetooth speakers that are out there. Including Bose, Alexa, Sonos, and others. For the money this JBL Charge 4 is a great value and sounds amazing!You can't go wrong with this speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality bass
reviews.reviewText: Clear strong base and long battery life. We have taken it to the lake, the beach and my son uses it in the bathroom while he showers. Very satisfied with it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The speaker is really good has good bass and it’s very loud

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent bluetooth speaker
reviews.reviewText: We had a bose soundlink mini but we let the kid take it to college. That's why we are in the market for another speaker. The current bose lineup has 3 speakers and I was rather confused so instead of getting the Bose I picked a different brand.The JBL charge 4 is much larger than the bose, the sound quality is good but the sound stage feels a little bit odd. The 2 radiators are pointing to the side which may have something to do with it? The Bose has all the speakers/radiators pointing in the same direction which may provide a better sound stage, or at least that's my theory.The JBL is also cheaper ($99 compared to the $129 price tag for the SoundLink Mini II) so it is worth the price, but it is slightly inferior to the Bose, but it is decent for listening to news or music in the office/home office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the best speaker ever!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have had this speaker roughly around two years now and it still works. Despite the minor charging issues that I have been having; it has outweighed all cons at this point. Yes, I know what you may be thinking that this speaker is renewed and or returned and fixed to be resold; yes, this may be true, but you can garuentee that this item will work FOREVERRRR the craftsmanship in this design of the Charge 4 is truly amazing. Its waterproof (just make sure you don't overly submerge it in water) its loud so you defiantly can have one and or connect two and jam out with your friends and family. They have great treble and base. Need I say more? If your contemplating, DON'T because this speaker is worth all the risk. It great! buy it and try it! you won't regret it. Trust me :D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this speaker
reviews.reviewText: I have three of these and couldn’t be happier . Being able to link them together is awesome for parties . You can have one going inside , one outside . Whatever you want . The range is great the sound is phenomenal for what it is . We take them on the boat , camping . You name it . Being able to charge things off it is a huge bonus as well. And battery life is great. Would give it 6 stars if I could .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Sonido portátil
reviews.reviewText: Excelente calidad de sonido para tan pequeño aparato. super portátil.lo compre de los renovados por Amazon a un buen precio. hasta el momento todo perfecto,
La bocina funciona muy bien llego muy bien empaquetadaEs reacondicionada pero parece nuevaBuenos bajos y muy buen precio
Excelente producto, llegó Perfecto!Estoy muy conforme con mi compra, muy recomendable!

I literally use this speaker everyday, it’s in the dust most days. Battery life is excellent, also usable as power bank. Sound is great, even for an outdoor atmosphere. Will definitely buy again, if this one develops problems.

reviews.reviewTitle: La bocina está increíble y excelente calidad d audio
reviews.reviewText: La durabilidad dela pila es muy buenaDura aproximadamente de 6 a 7 hr según el volumen

I love my Charge4. Can I stop there? It's really all you need to know. I use it everywhere...golf course, beach, in my car, in my house, outside my house. Big sound, surprising bass, and loud. It's got a long life even at moderate, near-loud volume, and it will power your phone to keep the tunes playing. Newer versions might be better or louder, but this is more than plenty.
